trans-unit.source: Provides functionality for resolving a coordinate-based location to a civic address.
trans-unit.target: Fornece funcionalidade para resolver um local baseado em coordenadas para um endereço civil.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver> class provides an implementation of <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver> that resolves a coordinate-based location to a civic address if the location provider provides both coordinates and civic address data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver> classe fornece uma implementação de <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver> um local baseados em coordenadas que resolve para um endereço civil se o provedor local fornece as coordenadas e dados de endereço civil.

trans-unit.source: The following program shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A> to resolve a civic address synchronously.
trans-unit.target: O programa a seguir mostra como chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A> para resolver um endereço civil de forma síncrona.

trans-unit.source: The following program shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> to resolve a civic address asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: O programa a seguir mostra como chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> para resolver um endereço civil de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> containing the location to resolve to a civic address.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> que contém o local a resolver para um endereço cívico.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously resolves a civic address from a location based on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Modo síncrono resolve um endereço civil de um local com base em latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: This call will block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.
trans-unit.target: Essa chamada bloqueará a execução do thread de chamada enquanto o endereço estiver sendo resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The civic address that is resolved from the <paramref name="coordinate" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: O endereço civil que é resolvido do parâmetro <paramref name="coordinate" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown" /> is returned if the address cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown" /> é retornado se o endereço não pode ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event is raised when the address resolve operation completes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> é gerado quando a operação de resolução de endereço é concluída.

trans-unit.source: The civic address that is resolved from the `coordinate` parameter is returned by the <xref:System.Device.Location.ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs.Address%2A> member of the <xref:System.Device.Location.ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs> object that is passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O endereço civil que é resolvido a partir de `coordinate` retornado pelo parâmetro o <xref:System.Device.Location.ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs.Address%2A> membro do <xref:System.Device.Location.ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs> objeto que é passado para o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following program demonstrates how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A> to resolve a civic address synchronously.
trans-unit.target: O programa a seguir demonstra como chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A> para resolver um endereço civil de forma síncrona.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="coordinate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="coordinate" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="coordinate" /> does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="coordinate" /> não contém uma latitude e uma longitude válidas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> containing the location to resolve to a civic address.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> que contém o local a resolver para um endereço cívico.

trans-unit.source: Resolves an address asynchronously from a location that is based on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Resolve um endereço de forma assíncrona de um local que se baseia em latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: The call does not block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.
trans-unit.target: Essa chamada não bloqueia a execução do thread de chamada enquanto o endereço está sendo resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The following program shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> to resolve a civic address asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: O programa a seguir mostra como chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> para resolver um endereço civil de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="coordinate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="coordinate" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="coordinate" /> does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="coordinate" /> não contém uma latitude e uma longitude válidas.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the address resolution that was initiated by a call to <see cref="M:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync(System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate)" /> completes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a resolução de endereço que foi iniciada por uma chamada a <see cref="M:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync(System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate)" /> é concluída.

trans-unit.source: The following program shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> to resolve a civic address asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: O programa a seguir mostra como chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> para resolver um endereço civil de forma assíncrona.
